data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Darkness Kingdom
data.detailed_description:
New from Ayato Sound Create, Darkness Kingdom is a fantastic well rounded pack for covering any dark, ominous scene your game might need.

Blending retro percussion, choirs and orchestral instruments, reminiscent of 90s game music soundtracks, with music for many different scenarios including battles, boss battles, field jungles, field dungeons, event themes and more, this pack is a great addition to our RPG-themed games and beyond!

Music with orchestration for fantasy, dark themes, danger, horror and more!
30 BGM in .ogg, ogg with loop tag, .mp3 and .wav formats.

Tracklist:

1. field_nomal_unity
2. field_nomal_enemy
3. field_dungeon_unity
4. field_dungeon_enemy
5. field_jungle_unity
6. field_jungle_enemy
7. field _sky_unity
8. field_sky_enemy
9. field_mental_unity
10. field_mental_enemy
11. field_lastl dungeon_unity
12. field_last dungeon_enemy
13. battle_invasion
14. battle_defense
15. battle_boss１
16. battle_boss２
17. battle_boss 3
18. battle_boss 4
19. result_victory
20. result_lose
21. event_intermission_enemy
22. event_intermission_enemy
23. event_moved
24. event_disturbance
25. event_parting
26. event_castle town
27. system_strategy
28. system_menu
29. system_title
30. system_main thema

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
